T02D2029:117a-0: rakta ya m'a ri sa ma dhi @117a * //
T02D2029:117a-3: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi cho
T02D2029:117a-4: ga / gshin rje gshed dmar po la phyag 'tshal
T02D2029:117a-5: lo // re zhig dang por gtor ma gzhung dang
T02D2029:117a-6: mthun par bshams la bsgrub bya la spyang ba bya
T02D2029:117a-7: lo // ba ni / kham phor dkar po lha bshos dang bcas pa gnyis dang /
T02D2029:117a-8: lci ba'i chang bu myu gu dang bcas pa gnyis pa dang /
T02D2029:117a-12: sol ba'i me rnams bsags la /
T02D2029:117a-13: rang nyid gshin rje gshed dmar po'i mngon par rtogs pa sgrub thabs bzhin bsgoms te /
T02D2029:117a-14: stong pa nyid kyi ngang las mdun du rlung gi
T02D2029:117a-15: dkyil 'khor gyi steng du me'i dkyil 'khor la nad
T02D2029:117a-16: pa la sogs pa'i bsgrub bya langs nas gnas par
T02D2029:117a-17: bsgom mo // de nas rang gi snying ga'i sa
T02D2029:117a-18: bon gyi 'od zer las byung ba'i khro bo gshin
T02D2029:117a-19: rje gshed lcags kyu dang zhags pa thogs pa rnams
T02D2029:117a-20: kyis khams gsum gyi 'dre thams cad bkug nas 'dre
T02D2029:117a-21: gcig la thim par bsams la /
T02D2029:117a-22: 'dre gcig pu de yang gcer bu skra grol ba /
T02D2029:117a-26: mi sdug pa cig bsams te /
T02D2029:117a-27: de yang bsgrub bya la thim par bsams nas /
T02D2029:117a-28: de'i spyi bor h'um las rdo rje rgya gram dang /
T02D2029:117a-29: rtsib logs gnyis su h'um re re las rdo rje rtse lnga pa re re bsams la /
T02D2029:117a-30: rdo rje de dag gis mnan pa dang /
T02D2029:117a-32: aom a'a: bighn'anta krita h'um zhes pa dang /
T02D2029:117a-33: hr'i: shdri:la sogs pa'i sngags brjod cing h'um las yungs
T02D2029:117a-34: kar rnams rdo rjer gyur pas brab nas bsgrub bya'i
T02D2029:117a-35: lus la rma dpag tu med pa byung nas nad
T02D2029:117a-36: dang gdon gyi dngos po thams cad kha'i nang nas
T02D2029:117a-38: yang nad dang gdon gyi lhag ma lus pa rnams
T02D2029:117a-39: yungs kar gyis brab pas tshig par bsam zhing de'i
T02D2029:117a-40: lhag ma rnams khyi nag por gyur nas kha'i nang
T02D2029:117a-41: nas phyir thon par bsam mo ;
T02D2029:117a-42: / de'i rjes la aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzr'a ya /
T02D2029:117a-43: badzra sa tva s+ya sarba p'a pam da ha sv'a h'a /
T02D2029:117a-44: zhes brjod cing yi ge h'um gis bzlas pa'i yungs
T02D2029:117a-45: kar g-yas pa dang cig shos kyi khu tshur gyis
T02D2029:117a-46: bzung nas / re re zhing g-yon skor du lan gnyis su byabs la sol ba'i mer bskyur ro //
T02D2029:117b-0: de @117b bzhin du g-yon dang g-yas su chus bya'o //
T02D2029:117b-1: de bzhin du kham phor la sogs pa rnams dang ras kyis kyang ngo //
T02D2029:117b-2: kham phor la sogs pa ni mer blugs par mi bya'o //
T02D2029:117b-3: bgegs sel gyi snying po bzlas pa'i dri zhim po'i
T02D2029:117b-4: chu ni snying gar byugs nas gu gul gyis bdug
T02D2029:117b-5: par bya'o // yang de'i rjes la rang nyid rigs kyi bdag por bsgoms te /
T02D2029:117b-6: ye shes sems dpa' cho ga bzhin du bcug nas /
T02D2029:117b-7: shes rab ma dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga mdun gyi nam mkhar bsams la /
T02D2029:117b-8: de dag gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba mdzad pa
T02D2029:117b-9: las shes rab ma dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs
T02D2029:117b-10: pa rnams 'dod chags chen pos zhu bar gyur te
T02D2029:117b-11: / rang nyid kyi spyi bo'i bu gar thim nas
T02D2029:117b-12: gsal tshigs kyi nang du zhugs shing rdo rje'i lam
T02D2029:117b-13: / nas phyung ste / rang nyid kyi shes rab
T02D2029:117b-14: ma'i zhal la thim pas bsgrub bya rnams de'i padmar
T02D2029:117b-15: gnas shing cig car stong nyid kyi rjes la h'um
T02D2029:117b-16: dang rdo rje las byung ba'i mi bskyod rdo rje'i
T02D2029:117b-17: gzugs can shes rab ma dang bcas shing ye shes
T02D2029:117b-18: sems dpa' dang dbyer med pa can la dbang bskur
T02D2029:117b-19: bar bsam zhing yang bsgrub bya rnams padma nas phyir
T02D2029:117b-20: phyung ste gnas pa la nam mkha' nas spyan ma
T02D2029:117b-21: la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams dang de bzhin gshegs
T02D2029:117b-22: pa rnams kyis bdud rtsis gang ba'i bum pa nas
T02D2029:117b-24: gzugs kyi rdo rje ma la sogs pa rnams kyis /
T02D2029:117b-25: bkra shis gang zhig sems can kun gyi snying la gnas //
T02D2029:117b-26: thams cad bdag nyid rigs kun bdag po ye shes
T02D2029:117b-27: mchog / sems can ma lus skyed byed bde ba
T02D2029:117b-28: chen po yi // bkra shis des ni dbang bskur
T02D2029:117b-29: mchog de khyed la shog / phun sum tshogs pa
T02D2029:117b-30: mnga' ba gser gyi ri bo 'dra //
T02D2029:117b-31: 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po dri ma gsum spangs pa //
T02D2029:117b-32: sangs rgyas padma'i spyan 'dra 'dab rab rgyas mnga' ba //
T02D2029:117b-33: bkra shis des ni de ring khyod la zhi byed
T02D2029:117b-34: shog / de yis nye bar bstan pa'i mchog rab
T02D2029:117b-35: mi g-yo ba // 'jig rten gsum na grags shing lha dang mis mchod pa //
T02D2029:117b-36: chos kyi mchog rab skye dgu rnams la zhi byed
T02D2029:117b-37: shog / bkra shis des ni skyed dgu rnams la
T02D2029:117b-38: zhi byed shog / dge 'dun dam pa chos ldan
T02D2029:118a-1: phyug / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyis mchod pa'i gnas //
T02D2029:118a-2: tshogs kyi mchog rab ngo tsha shes shing dpal gyi gzhi //
T02D2029:118a-3: bkra shis des ni de ring khyod la zhi byed shog / ces brjod par bsam mo //
T02D2029:118a-4: chu'i bum pa'i dbang ni padma'i snod nas g-yas pas
T02D2029:118a-5: lo ma dang bcas pa'i rdo rjes chu blangs la
T02D2029:118a-6: bsgrub bya'i gos la sogs pa la gtor zhing /
T02D2029:118a-7: aom ma h'a su kha badzra satva aa bhi she ka stvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi /
T02D2029:118a-8: sarba ta th'a ga ta aa dhi pa to te na dri dho me bha ba zhes so //
T02D2029:118a-9: yang rdo rje'i rtse mo la lo ma dang bcas pas bsgrub bya'i lus la blugs shing /
T02D2029:118a-10: rdo rje chen po'i dbang bskur ba//
T02D2029:118a-11: khams gsum pa yis phyag byas pa //
T02D2029:118a-12: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum pa //
T02D2029:118a-13: gnas las byung ba spyin par bya //
T02D2029:118a-14: aom a'a: badzrod ka aa bhi shinytsa h'um su ra stvam aa ham //
T02D2029:118a-15: zhes brjod cing dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2029:118a-16: de'i tshe bde ba chen po dang snyoms par zhugs par gyur pa'i chu'i dbang bskur ro ;
T02D2029:118a-17: / de nas gtor ma'i cho ga gzhung dang mthun par byas la /
T02D2029:118a-18: gtor ma spyang ba bya ba'i rdzas rnams shing gcig gam lam rgya gram mam /
T02D2029:118a-19: chu bo chen po'i 'gram du bskyal la rjes su chu yis gcad par bya'o //
T02D2029:118a-20: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi cho
T02D2029:118a-21: ga slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so
